reset(num_sat)[source]¶

Used by ACO DCMST construction algorithm to “reset” an ant for the next iteration of the algorithm. :param num_sat:

Bases: object

enhance(gamma)[source]¶

Used by ACO DCMST construction algorithm to update pheromones of edges found in the best DCMST found (so far) by the algorithm. :param gamma:

restart()[source]¶

Used by ACO DCMST construction algorithm to escape local optimum.

update_pheromone(eta, minPhm, maxPhm)[source]¶

Used by Edge class in ACO DCMST construction algorithm to update pheromones of the edge. :param eta: :param minPhm: :param maxPhm:

dcmst_construction_algorithms.ant_colony_optimisation.ant_colony(cost_matrix, constraints, num_sat: int, max_iterations: int = 10000, max_iterations_without_improvement: int = 2500, max_steps: int = 75, eta: float = 0.5, gamma: float = 1.5, eta_change: float = 0.95, gamma_change: float = 1.05, R: int = 100)[source]¶
Algorithm that constructs a DCMST using an ant-based algorithm. Adapted from T. N. Bui, X. Deng, and C. M. Zrncic,

“An Improved Ant-Based Algorithm for the Degree-Constrained Minimum Spanning Tree Problem,” IEEE Trans. On Evol. Computation, vol. 16, no. 2, pp. 266-278, Apr. 2012., doi: 10.1109/TEVC.2011.2125971. Default values for function recommended by this original paper.

Parameters

  • cost_matrix –

  • constraints –

  • num_sat –

  • max_iterations –

  • max_iterations_without_improvement –

  • max_steps –

  • eta –

  • gamma –

  • eta_change –

  • gamma_change –

  • R –

Returns

dcmst_construction_algorithms.ant_colony_optimisation.construct_spanning_tree(edges, constraints, nCandidates, num_sat)[source]¶

Modified version of Kruskal’s algorithm used to construct a DCMST - used in the ACO algorithm to create a DCMST based on pheromones laid by ants and edge costs. :param edges: :param constraints: :param nCandidates: :param num_sat: :return:

dcmst_construction_algorithms.ant_colony_optimisation.initialise_ants_and_edges(cost_matrix, num_sat)[source]¶

Initialises ants and edges (they are associated with other values, such as pheromones) for ACO DCMST construction algorithm. :param cost_matrix: :param num_sat: :return:

dcmst_construction_algorithms.ant_colony_optimisation.move_ants(ants, edges, max_steps, update_period, eta, minPhm, maxPhm)[source]¶
dcmst_construction_algorithms.ant_colony_optimisation.solution_fitness(tree)[source]¶

Calculates the sum of all edge costs within a given DCMST - used by the ACO DCMST construction algorithm. :param tree: :return:
